problem_text_cn: 已知Rt△ABC的斜边AB=5,一条直角边AC=3,以直线BC为轴旋转一周得到一个圆锥,则这个圆锥的侧面积为()
problem_text_en: Knowing that the hypotenuse AB = N_0 of Rt△ABC, the leg AC = N_1, take the straight line BC as the axis to rotate one circle to obtain a cone, then the lateral area of ​​the cone is ()
raw_answer: 解:圆锥的底面周长=6π,那么侧面积=\frac{1}{2}×6π×5=15π,故选C．
raw_comment: 本题利用了勾股定理,圆的周长公式和扇形面积公式求解．
